description:
This water-resistant formula has a natural papaya scent and is easy to apply. Make sure you bring enough for everyone.

  • Broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection is stable under sunlight
  • Free of hormone disrupting chemicals. No oxybenzone
  • No titanium dioxide. Contains zinc that has been micronized for easy application and absorption
  • Contains antioxidant vitamins C and E to ward off free radicals caused by sunlight
  • 5-layer tube decreases the possibility of leakage and puncture
  • Rated water resistant (80 minutes), the highest possible rating
name: Thinksport SPF 50+ Sunscreen 177ml - Infants to Youths
